name: Overheat
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Donquixote Pirates
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, return up to 1 active Character with a cost of 3 or less to the owner's hand.
trigger: [Trigger] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less to the owner's hand.
